doc.after: Despite massive mineral reserves Badakhshan is one of the most destitute areas in the world Opium poppy growing is the only real source of income in the province and Badakhshan has one of the highest rates of maternal mortality in the world due to the complete lack of health infrastructure inaccessible locations and bitter winters of the province BORNA Institute of Higher Education being the first private university located on the bank of Kokcha river
